title: MechWarrior Quadrology (Eng/Rus) [RePack] RG Catalyst
description:
Once upon a time in the distant future, mankind is tired killed by tanks, planes and sapper shovels. In addition to the primitive tools of high-tech engineering idea gave birth to combat robots - Mech. Multi-ton Titans running brave MechWarrior brought death and joy throughout the galaxy. Hearing the heavy tread of the fur, the enemy threw their heels (and if the pilot is a fool, and threw his heels). When the cars came together to battle the elements humbly died down, giving way to the terrifying power of the steel monsters. Fierce flashes of laser batteries, the thunder of explosions and bursts of automatic extravaganza repeatedly shook the earth and the sky. And after, was quiet and timid raindrops hopelessly frustrated by the steaming armor defeated the Giants. What a pity that such a nifiga you will not see. Well, as you see, no time will be. The briefing MechWarrior no point of admiring the rain. Battle, battle, battle.

Provided purchase, modernization and utilization of stylish fur, mind-boggling 16-color graphics and a view from the dashboard with buttons. In the SNES version of the graphics pomodnee, by the way.
MechWarrior 3050 (SNES), does not continue the story of noble revenge. This time the hero (and not the one and the other) riding on Robot Chicken on the side of the clans and disassemble the parts inventory of the Inner Sphere. A-ha-ha, here it is impossible to change the robot. But you can put different guns and look at voynushku in perspective. Senses, the earth trembles and lemmings gleefully preparing to group suicide? .. On the horizon, there were huge fighting robots! Proud heavy tread of the second part of MechWarrior is in our home ... Blows ... bearing walls, floors, and crushes out from the back side ... 
You still remember the 16-colored beauty of the first part? Do not cry tears of blood, it was not so bad. So, now it's much better. Even under DOS new technologies give heat. And under vindosom and that's Tale - textures, dynamic lighting, 3D acceleration, mouse, after all. And then there are the sounds of music and movies ... Really, gentlemen, a complete delight! 
Today we happen to make war on the side of the warring clans Wolf and Falcon commit massacres in the name of the Ghost Bear and even feel like a mercenary, fighting for the voiceless loans. New battles, new feeling - a good old BattleTech!
You are not enthusiastic? Lemmings are collected from the nearest cliff - go ahead after!

complement to the scene Pirate's Moon even more fun. Here you can feel yourself as a pirate on the fur with a wooden leg and a side matershinnika. Resistance forces it seeks to overthrow the adversary and desperately pratizanit. But pratizany on furs are not placed in the dugouts, so the war is going to be spectacular. Viva la resistance! after civil warfare story does not end there - add Black Knight offers perementutsya on the side of the Legion of mercenaries, and ears have to kick myself to Ian. Will there be that simple? .. And fuck you!
